Shapes.description: UI components from the Bootstrap front-end framework
Shapes.author: Nathaniel Watson (nwatson.nz)

PropertyGroup.name: Text

Property.name: contentText
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'content', bound: Bound.fromBox($box, 0, 5), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 0), multi: true})

PropertyGroup.Property: #Dropdown header Selected Item* Another Item -- _Disabled Item

For.D:
var tl, tr; // Radius of top corners tl = tr = $radius.x;
"M " + ($selected.value ? + $leftLine.x : "0") + "," + $box.h + "L 0," + $box.h + " L 0," + tl + " a " + tl + "," + tl + " 0 0,1 " + tl + "," + -tl + "L " + ($box.w - tr) + ",0 a " + tr + "," + tr + " 0 0,1 " + tr + "," + tr + "l 0," + ($box.h - tr) + ($selected.value ? "L " + $rightLine.x + "," + $box.h : "")

PropertyGroup.name: Text
PropertyGroup.Property: Well done! You successfully read this important alert message.

Shortcut.PropertyValue: Heads up! This alert needs your attention, but it's not super important.
Warning! Best check yo self, you're not looking too good.
Oh snap! Change a few things up and try submitting again.

For.D:
var tl, tr, br, bl; // Radius of each corner tl = tr = $radius.x; bl = br = 0;
"M " + tl + ",0 L " + ($box.w - tr) + ",0 a " + tr + "," + tr + " 0 0,1 " + tr + "," + tr + "l 0," + ($height.y - tr - br) + " a " + br + "," + br + " 0 0,1 " + -br + "," + br + "L " + bl + "," + $height.y + " a " + bl + "," + bl + " 0 0,1 " + -bl + "," + -bl + "L 0," + tl + " a " + tl + "," + tl + " 0 0,1 " + tl + "," + -tl + "Z"

PropertyGroup.name: Text

Property.name: contentText
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'content', bound: Bound.fromBox($box, 0, 5), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 0), multi: true})

PropertyGroup.Property: Title | Director | Year The Wizard of Oz | Victor Fleming | 1939 The Third Man | Carol Reed | 1949 Citizen Kane | Orson Welles | 1941

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'text', bound: Bound.fromBox($box, 15, 8), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 1), multi: false})
